about_the_game:
As the Acurine Portals stir to life once more, a young blacksmith named Calvas steps forward to uncover the truth behind the realm's past and face the challenges of the present. The destiny of Haven lies in his hands as he embarks on a journey to restore balance and rediscover the magic that once connected the realm.

Will Calvas be able to wield the power of the Acurine Heart for good, or will he fall victim to the darkness that lingers in the shadows? Only time will tell as the echoes of history reverberate within the Arcane Spire, and the fate of Haven hangs in the balance.


  • An epic adventure!

Embark on an enthralling journey alongside Calvas, navigating a world teeming with danger, challenges, and enigmatic magic. Explore diverse landscapes, from enchanted forests to labyrinthine dungeons, each with its unique mysteries.

  • Formidable foes!

Confront formidable adversaries and powerful foes as you strive to unravel the secrets behind the reactivated portals. Engage in intense combat, showcasing your combat skills and tactical prowess.


  • Intricate puzzles!

Solve intricate puzzles that guard the secrets of the Acurine Heart!. Your intellect and wit will be crucial to overcoming these challenges and progressing through the game's storyline.

  • Harness the power of Acurine!
Discover the power of the Acurine Shards! Harness elemental powers to dynamically enhance your abilities!


Unravel the mysteries behind the ancient portals, their sudden reactivation, and the malevolent entity coveting the Acurine Heart!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / AMD R9 280X
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 7 170
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD RX Vega 56
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: A souls-like, action-adventure game where players harness elemental powers through Acurine shards, enhancing their abilities. Explore varied realms, battle formidable foes, and solve intricate puzzles! Embark on Calvas' journey, revealing the secrets of the Acurine Heart!
